mainText:
Steve was my role model. He led with a strong vision and he made that vision
be known to the whole world through his hard work and quality of style.
Its so sad to see him pass. Today is truly a sad day and I am taken back
that it arrived so early. But now he is somewhere else working on his next
project.

My blessings to his family, his Apple team, and his fans.
header: My Role Model has started his next Project
author: Raad
